author: Nick Timiraos
title: Fed Minutes to Offer Clues on Where Rates Are Headed
text:
The Federal Reserve will shed more light Wednesday on policy makersâ€™ outlook for the second half of the year when it releases the minutes of its May 1-2 meeting. Officials voted then to hold steady their benchmark federal-funds rate in a range between 1.5% and 1.75%.
The minutes, to be released at 2 p.m. EDT, could offer new clues about how...
